channel.title: CVE Feed for aumkub -- Featured Image Generator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for aumkub -- Featured Image Generator

item.title: CVE-2024-5677|2024-07-10T13:44:22.941Z -- aumkub -- featured%20image%20generator
item.description: The Featured Image Generator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized image upload due to a missing capability check on the fig_save_after_generate_image function in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to upload arbitrary images to a post-related gallery.

item.title: CVE-2024-5677|2024-07-10T02:02:45.594Z -- aumkub -- featured%20image%20generator
item.description: The Featured Image Generator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized image upload due to a missing capability check on the fig_save_after_generate_image function in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to upload arbitrary images to a post-related gallery.
